snippet: A federal judge has ruled that the Washington transit system must accept a pro-Israel advertisement that equates radical Muslims with savages.
abstract: Federal Judge Rosemary M Collyer rules that Washington transit system must accept pro-Israel advertisement that equates radical Muslims with savages.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge has ruled that the Washington transit system must accept a pro-Israel advertisement that equates radical Muslims with savages.

headline.seo: Judge Orders Metro to Display Provocative Ads
headline.main: Judge Orders Metro to Display Provocative Ads
headline.print_headline: Judge Orders Metro To Display Provocative Ads
